title: CHG0130603 Feature/service account jenkins dev
description:
**TASK ID:**  CSPI-607
**BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF CHANGE:** service account is needed for storing test results on dev account in s3. Test results will be copied by Jenkins from WHC
**TERRAFORM PLAN OUTPUT:** [service-account_dev_plan.out](/uploads/bc8984fd40f860f1038440ad8f208a0e/service-account_dev_plan.out)
